  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    GardenBuddyApplication
    Initializes (in the GardenBuddyApplication.onCreate() method) application-level resources.
    GardenBuddyDatabase
    The database holds all of the entities and allows the application to call the context and other instances needed in different classes.
    GardenBuddyDatabase.Converters
    Converts the dates into a Long to be used within the application if a date needs to use Long.
    GoogleSignInService
    The GoogleSignInService class allows the application to connect to the Google Cloud and recognize the google accounts being used to sign in.
    History
    The plantId is the foreign key used with the History Database.
    HistoryDao
    HistoryDao is not yet implemented into the features in the app.
    HomeFragment
    Home fragment is the first page that displays after Google Sign in upon launching of the app.
    HomeViewModel
    Currently just a placeholder.
    LoginActivity
    This is the LoginActivity page which uses Google Sign in to log users in with their Google accounts so that the application can remember them regardless of which device a user may be using.
    MainActivityDrawer
    MainActivityDrawer is the mainActivity class for the application.
    Note
    The plantId is the foreign key used with the Note Database.
    Note.Category
    Category is an enum that is set up for three different categories; Pest, Weather, and Other.
    NoteDao
    NoteDao will track all Notes added in to the database.
    NotesFragment
    This is the notes fragment which will show all categories of notes.
    NotesViewModel
    NotesViewModel gathers everything needed to display on the notes Fragment when the notes page is loaded and displayed.
    OtherAdapter
    OtherAdapter class allows the recycler view of the user input notes to be displayed on the UI.
    OtherNoteFragment
    OtherNoteFragment creates the Dialog to insert a new note into the database and allows the new notes to be saved to the Plant Repository based on the category and plants selected.
    PestAdapter
    PestAdapter class allows the recycler view of the user input notes to be displayed on the UI.
    PestNoteFragment
    PestNoteFragment creates the Dialog to insert a new note into the database and allows the new notes to be saved to the Plant Repository based on the category and plants selected.
    Plant
    Plant Entity is the parent entity to History and Note.
    PlantDao
    PlantDao will track all Plants added in to the database.
    PlantFragment
    PlantFragment is currently a placeholder page.
    PlantRepository
    The PlantRepository connects the Entities to each other for use.
    PlantViewModel
    Currently a placeholder that displays the text saying it is a plant fragment when the page is loaded.
    PlantWithHistories
    Attaches all Histories to the Plants.
    PlantWithNotes
    All Notes must be associated to a Plant.
    WeatherAdapter
    WeatherAdapter class allows the recycler view of the user input notes to be displayed on the UI.
    WeatherNoteFragment
    OtherNoteFragment creates the Dialog to insert a new note into the database and allows the new notes to be saved to the Plant Repository based on the category and plants selected.
